data.title: Frickley DN5, Doncaster, DN5
data.meta_description: Property details for Frickley DN5. One of many properties to rent in Doncaster, DN5 from Savills, world leading estate agents.
data.text:
Detailed Description

A large, detached property situated within a prominent, private location on an Estate, accessed via a well-maintained private track.

Ground floor - Entrance hallway, a large kitchen (with separate pantry and cold store), 3 large reception rooms, laundry/utility room and a w/c.

First Floor - landing leading to 4 large bedrooms, 2 smaller rooms with a variety of uses, 3 shower/bathrooms.

Oil fired central heating and double glazed throughout.

Please note the property is currently undergoing some refurbishment which can be explained in full at time of viewing.

Outside

There is a large garden of 0.7 acres in size, plenty of parking and several traditional outbuildings to the rear of the property.

Tenancy

RENT: £1,600 per calendar month. Payable in advance by bank standing order. Minimum 12 month agreement.

DEPOSIT: £1,846 (five weeks rent) will be held by Savills as Stakeholder in a non-interest bearing account and registered with The Tenancy Deposit Scheme. It will be returnable on termination, subject to compliance with the terms and conditions of the agreement.

No Smoking.

Pets considered - must be approved by the landlord in writing beforehand.

Services

Mains electric and water.

Viewing

Strictly by appointment only with Savills York Office.
